messages.content: Hello there, what's your favorite anime?
I love watching Naruto its so cool man!
Naruto is awesome! I love the character development and the fight scenes are so well animated.
I nothin bout dat it's so gud! Especially when sasuke vs naruto happen!
Sasuke vs Naruto is one of the best fights in the series! I love how they both go all
dat it's like dey really hatin each othr or somethin!
Yeah, they really do hate each other. But it's also clear that they care for each
deir own way ya know? like sasuke always tryna show dat he ain't gonna back down
